description.english: Upgrade a skill to maximum level.
Use a lockpick on a chest.
Reach maximum level with the Adventurer.
Reach maximum level with the Tailor.
Reach maximum level with the Blacksmith.
Reach maximum level with the Alchemist.
Reach maximum level with the Occultist.
Reach maximum level with the Goldsmith.
Reach maximum level with the Cook.
Enter the Treasure Chamber in Tombstone Hollows.
Unlock the Witch Lantern in New Game Plus.
